topic.title: Embed zeronet to a regular website
topic.body:
Hi:
Is it possible to embed zeronet conents like videos and image to a regular website?
Thanks

1550918453_14XR9KNwgJhCv1RiuqKxjBDkCRETj.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_551_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You might as well be using IPFS instead. [...]

Yes, IPFS is good.
But it is possible to leak my server IP address if some one need to trace it.
Is it possible to trace my IP if i use zeronet?
